CoachLayoutDef.description: coach layout providing data to draw a coach layout. The items of a coach are located via coordinates with (0,0) in the upper left corner. All coordinates are given without sign.

places.description: list of places included in the layout

x.description: horizontal coordinate of the center of the place

y.description: vertical coordinate of the center of the place

id.description: id of the graphical item type. Code list according to UIC90918-1 graphical item type e.g. seat = 1, berth = 2, couchette = 3

number.description: place numer as displayed physically on the place

direction.description: direction of a place, defined optional as it might be omitted in case of berths in future. Code list according to UIC90918-1 Values R = to right, L = to left, U = up  (from right side of a coach pointing to the middle of the aile), D = down (from right side of the coach pointing to the middle of the aile)

remarkId.description:
remark concerning the place (e.g. to be used in a tool tip). Code list according to UIC90918-1 
 - value 1 place might have a table - value 2 table at the place might be missing - value 3 place might have a different direction - value 4 place might have a table and a different direction - value 5 table at the place might be missing and place might have a different direction - value 6 place might be in compartment - value 7  place might be in open space

zOrder.description:
graphical layer where this item has to be placed. 
 Code list according to UIC90918-1  0 = lowest layer usually used for walls 
  1 = middle layer usually used by places
  2 = top layer usually used by icons

x.description: horizontal coordinate of the center of the place

y.description: vertical coordinate of the center of the place

id.description: id of the graphical item type. Code list according to UIC90918-1 graphical item type e.g. silence area sign = 116
